headline: Does ADP’s Consistent Growth Signal More Gains in 2025 After Latest Earnings Results?
summary: If you are thinking about what to do with your Automatic Data Processing shares today, or whether now is the moment to start a position, you are not alone. This stock sits at the crossroads of long-term reliability and recent fluctuations, so deciding what to do next matters. In the past year, ADP has put up a 12.5% gain, while extending to an impressive 143.6% return over the last five years. Even though the last seven days saw a minor slip of -1.3%, and last month was up just 1.2%, ADP...
